text: I am working a page template file and added an existing module that displays the most recent blog posts in a card-style format. I can see the module working beautifully as designed in preview, but when I attempt to publish, I get an error that states it 'Cannot resolve property' but it isn't telling me what property or where. I know its related to the blog module, but when I view the module there are no errors. When I remove it, the page will publish. Thoughts?
Here's a video of what is happening: <https://d.pr/XhD4p7>
